thread.section_title: Ibis Tour Eiffel Cambronne - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel and experience
thread.title_full: Good hotel and experience - Review of Ibis Tour Eiffel Cambronne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jason R
title: Good hotel and experience
text: This hotel was booked with a package we bought online. It's a good hotel. I think it's about a 3 star hotel, but I'm not sure how many stars they officially have. It's very convenient to many things and literally about 100 yards from the metro. Nearly all the staff spoke English, too, which was helpful!
